tagline: Full-stack generalist spanning API design, mobile, frontend, and UI/UX — sees the whole product
pros: Can work across every layer of the stack — API, web, mobile, UI — without context-switching friction
Catches integration bugs at boundaries that specialists in a single layer miss
Unblocks teams by prototyping vertical slices through the full stack quickly
Translates fluently between design, frontend, backend, and mobile vocabularies
cons: Won't match a specialist's depth in any single layer — complex query optimization, advanced animations, or native platform edge cases need expert review
Can spread thin on large projects that demand deep expertise in multiple areas simultaneously
Prototyping speed can create technical debt if specialist follow-up is delayed

model_recommendations.notes: Solid reasoning + good writing. Benefits from thinking but doesn't need max reasoning. Best cost/capability balance.
